item.title: 2018 06 14 Tidy Parallel Loading of Rdata Files
item.description: In my last project, I have been using the following function a lot: load2env <- function(file,env = new.env()) { load(file,envir = env) env } This function load the RData file into the environment env, which will return. However, if we have multiple files to load simultaneously then we would like to load those files in parallel.
